events.name: GDG Kingston Launch @ Technology Innovation Centre
events.description: We will be introducing the Google Developer Group to Kingston and it's environs so members and the general public can get a solid grasp of what the group will be about; the overall plans that will help to grow the tech ecosystem in the country.

events.name: Kingston, the next Mecca for Tech Talent in the Caribbean? Let's Discuss!
events.description: We have been having a lot of discussions about how the Future of Work will change the way how we live and work in the times to come. Technological advancements have bred a new suite of tools that have made communication and collaboration seamless no matter your timezone, language or background. These tools combined with the shortage of tech talent in the US and EU have created a digital workforce gap that needs to be filled. But with these tools what are the skills and talent that will be first in line to leverage opportunities present in this digital workforce? How can we as a city prepare our youth to become exporters of tech talent? What will be the economic impact if we spend the next 5 - 10 years sowing seeds of tech expertise in our schools? These questions are more will be answered when we convene at our next event!
events.how_to_find_us: Outpost Republic is located across CRU Bar / CPJ. Once you enter you can ask the security guard to lead you to the location.

events.name: Jumpstart your tech career with Open Source
events.description:
The first event in our professional development series: We will dive into the power of open-source software and how it can transform your career and business in this digital age where software solutions are being built and shared by people all over the world.

This event includes demos, stories, and discussions from members of our Kingston community sharing the contributions they have made to the world of open source. We will give a deep dive into how you can contribute and benefit from this movement.

Our very own Joel Dean will conduct an introductory presentation/workshop to Github, the leading host for Open Source Software worldwide. Following this will be several interesting demos of cool software that were made by Jamaicans and have made it all across the web!

Grow your network and connect with a representative of the Technology Innovation Center, a leading incubator for entrepreneurs and innovators in a casual and relaxed informal setting. RSVP now as seating is limited, the first 45 RSVPs will be guaranteed seats.

Refreshments will also be provided!
events.how_to_find_us: The event will be held at the Technology Innovation Center. Once you come into the main gate and you reach the roundabout you take a left. You then come all the way down to the end of the road and the building will be on the right-hand side.

events.name: Remote Work : The Future Is Now!
events.description:
Many of us would agree, the COVID-19 pandemic has fundamentally changed the way we live and work. We’ve seen shelter in place orders enforced on a global scale, in an effort to curb the spread of the virus leaving remote work, the most viable option for continued economic activity among non-essential groups.

Even amidst a global crisis, employees are reporting greater productivity and higher job satisfaction, which inevitably translates to more profitability for their employers.

Our news feeds are inundated with reports and projections about the future for knowledge workers who’ve been working remotely since the lockdowns. Will we go back to the office?

We will be speaking with a few experts who boast a collective 15+ years of remote experience. They will be facilitating this timely discussion and responding to some of your most pressing concerns.

Grow your network and connect with entrepreneurs and innovators who are facing today’s challenges, to create the future.

We will have a few announcements for our attendees, so RSVP now to be a part of this groundbreaking presentation.

organizers.name: Joel D.
organizers.bio: A seasoned software engineering manager & architect that enjoys building and deploying a wide range of software solutions from Android & iOS apps to Desktop Apps and Web Services.

group_profile.intro: A seasoned software engineering manager & architect that enjoys building and deploying a wide range of software solutions from Android & iOS apps to Desktop Apps and Web Services.
